usa: The Aldrich–Vreeland Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-32" class="reference">[32]</sup>
The Bureau of Investigation (later the FBI) was established.<sup id="cite_ref-33" class="reference">[33]</sup>
The Ford Model T appeared on the market.<sup id="cite_ref-FordTimeline_9-1" class="reference">[9]</sup>
United States presidential election, 1908: U.S. Secretary of War William Howard Taft was elected President, defeating former Nebraska Representative William Jennings Bryan.[34]
The Root–Takahira Agreement was reached.<sup id="cite_ref-35" class="reference">[35]</sup>
